CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/8/0x3f0f4710024b4f6a4ecf47831a27465e778caf27.sol#919-929) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/8/0x3f0f4710024b4f6a4ecf47831a27465e778caf27.sol#926-929)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/8/0x3f0f4710024b4f6a4ecf47831a27465e778caf27.sol#927-929)
